get.description: Quickly generate invoices through a REST API endpoint

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Represents the invoice number

parameters.name: buyer_company_name
parameters.description: The company name of the buyer entity. It can also be just a simple name of a person in case the buyer is not a company.

parameters.name: buyer_tax_number
parameters.description: The tax number of the buyer's company. This field is not mandatory.

parameters.name: buyer_vat_number
parameters.description: The VAT number of the buyer's company. This field is not mandatory.

parameters.name: buyer_address
parameters.description: The address of the buyer entity. This field is not mandatory.

parameters.name: seller_company_name
parameters.description: The company name of the seller entity. This can be a person's name as well, in case the seller is not a company.

parameters.name: seller_tax_number
parameters.description: The tax number of the seller's company. This field is not mandatory.

parameters.name: seller_vat_number
parameters.description: The VAT number of the seller's company. This field is not mandatory.

parameters.name: seller_address
parameters.description: The address of the seller. This field is not mandatory.

parameters.name: seller_bank_name
parameters.description: The bank name of the account of the seller. This field is not mandatory.

parameters.name: seller_bank_account
parameters.description: The bank account of the seller, where the payment will be made. This field is not mandatory.

parameters.name: services
parameters.description: A JSON representing the services, and their prices that will be written on the invoice. The JSON is using the following format: [{\\\\\\\"name\\\\\\\": \\\\\\\"My Service\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"price\\\\\\\": \\\\\\\"30\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"units\\\\\\\": \\\\\\\"Hours\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"discount\\\\\\\": \\\\\\\"1000\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"quantity\\\\\\\": \\\\\\\"1000\\\\\\\"}] The JSON is an array. Each element of the array represents a service. Each service is a JSON object with the following properties: nam

parameters.name: tax
parameters.description: The tax percentage aplied to the invoice.

parameters.name: shipping
parameters.description: The amount to be paid for shipping. This field is not mandatory.

parameters.name: service_fee
parameters.description: A service fee to add on the invoice. This field is not mandatory.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency in which the prices will be shown on the invoices. It can be any 3 letter currency code. If the code is not recognized then it will be simply displayed directly.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the invoice

parameters.name: due_date
parameters.description: The due date of the invoice. This field is not mandatory.

parameters.name: logo
parameters.description: A logo to display on the top left corner of the invoice. This field is not mandatory.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The language of the invoice. Accepted languages are: 'en' => 'English', 'nl' => 'Dutch', 'de' => 'German', 'es' => 'Spanish', 'fr' => 'French', 'it' => 'Italian', 'pl' => 'Polish', 'pt_BR' => 'Brazilian Portuguese', 'ro' => 'Romanian',
